attributes.action: Stop the extreme bias against Jeremy Corbyn in main stream media!
attributes.additional_details: The majority of our newspapers are owned by Conservatives. It is about time we got a larger mix of news from all sides of the political spectrum!
attributes.background: Our mainstream media whether it be newspapers or TV news channels is heavily biased against Jeremy Corbyn! From day one he has had to put up with media smears left, right and centre and much more so than any other MP of any party. We know what is going on and it needs to change!

rejection.details:
Complaints about the press are the responsibility of the Independent Press Standards Organisation (IPSO), not  the Government or Parliament. 

You can find out how to make a complaint to IPSO here:

https://www.ipso.co.uk/IPSO/makeacomplaint.html
